headline: A Look At Prudential Financial (PRU) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Why Prudential Financial Is on Investors’ Radar Prudential Financial (PRU) has drawn attention after recent share price moves, with the stock showing a mix of shorter term declines and a positive past 3 months, prompting fresh comparisons with its underlying fundamentals.
